text: Dera Nawab Sahib railway station (Urdu and ) is located in Ahmadpur East Tehsil, Bahawalpur district of Punjab province of the Pakistan.This is one of the first railway station in sub-continent. It was built by Nawab Of Bahawalpur. It has a beautiful building. It was Constructed in 1856. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Bahawalpur District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Dera Nawab Sahib railway station
